body:
iwyu cannot find clang's headers if they are installed in separate prefixes, see: https://github.com/include-what-you-use/include-what-you-use#how-to-install

cc @sethrj

I used a simple approach with `prefix.lib.clang` but can also change it to calling `clang/iwyu -print-resource-dir`.
title: iwyu: link clang resources in the right location
